summary: Meilisearch Admin Config feature testing complete. All 19 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend testing passed - Search/Meilisearch card renders for super_admin with proper tab switching, form inputs, and action buttons.
critical_code_review_comments: _serialize_meili_config correctly masks key as '••••' and excludes ciphertext (line 15290-15302)
All meili admin endpoints correctly use check_permissions(['super_admin']) decorator
Activation gate properly tests meili connection before allowing status=active
Revoked configs correctly blocked from test/activate operations
seed_data_creation: Backend tests created test configs which are visible in history
context_for_next_testing_agent: Meilisearch config endpoints at /api/admin/system-settings/meilisearch are fully tested. History shows 6+ configs. Active config at http://127.0.0.1:17700 with PASS test status.

test_scenarios_verified.RBAC_non_admin_403: PASS - Non-super_admin (individual user) gets 403 on all meili endpoints
test_scenarios_verified.GET_active_config: PASS - Returns 200 with encryption_key_present, active_config, default_index_name
test_scenarios_verified.key_masking_active: PASS - Active config has master_key_masked='••••', no ciphertext
test_scenarios_verified.key_masking_history: PASS - History items have master_key_masked='••••', no ciphertext
test_scenarios_verified.create_config_201: PASS - POST creates config with status=inactive
test_scenarios_verified.test_endpoint_fail: PASS - Test returns FAIL with connection_error for unreachable meili
test_scenarios_verified.activate_gate_fail: PASS - Activate rejected when test fails (connection_error)
test_scenarios_verified.frontend_tab_switch: PASS - Aktif Konfig / Geçmiş tabs work correctly
test_scenarios_verified.frontend_form_inputs: PASS - URL, Index, Master Key inputs present

security_verification.key_never_returned_in_plaintext: VERIFIED - meili_master_key_ciphertext excluded from all responses
security_verification.key_masked_in_ui: VERIFIED - Key shown as '••••' in history and active config
security_verification.rbac_super_admin_only: VERIFIED - All endpoints require super_admin role
